contentData.testimonialDescription: I was impressed with ATA's service of their technical support team. I called them last week to inquire about the problem of remote control for my garage roller door. The gentleman Bill from their technical support was very professional and patient in helping me to go through tedious steps to fix the roller door which was jammed and not syn with the remote control. Finally we got it fixed after spent a fair amount of time. I appreciate Bill's efforts and responsiveness in this matter. I highly recommend anyone to buy their product as you know you are going to get a good technical service if needed.

Our business chooses to install Ata motors because we believe they are the best on the market, for both cost and longevity. I have seen some ATA motors last 30 years. We have had a roller door unit for 20 years on one of our sheds. Gets opened 5-10 times a week!
I have 2 Syncro Openers and a roller door opener on my doors at home. Sensational openers! Never had an issue with them and the smart phone control system is phenomenal
Great customer service. Usually, service companies charge people overpriced service fees for simple solutions. To my surprise, they provided us free of charge. Appreciated!

I love my Automatic Technology openers.  I have just had an Automatic Technology Easyroller opener installed and the technician also connected it to my gate opener so I can control both with the same remote.  I have also added the smart phone control system so I can operate my doors remotely for access and security.  Highly recommended.
